p: Lo et al. ( 2019) also displayed that RDV prevent Nipah virus infection in monkeys. Furthermore, to assess the reduction of MERS-CoV infection in vivo, Sheahan et al. ( 2020) demonstrated that RDV stimulate superior antiviral function against MERS-CoV in cell culture and animal models as compared with other conventional anti-viral agents ( Figure 4). Furthermore, they found that RDV was the only therapeutic agent which remarkably decreased pulmonary infection.
